"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558c890f63687238a1000746#post_558c890f63687238a1000746
[bq="mariomarc"]So Wednesday next week is Canada Day, meaning I should have a holiday 
But my decided at break that because we can still work Wednesday, that we are going to
Now he knows that everyone else is fine with it, but I like days
And he doesn't even ask, he just says I'll be working that day too
I love so much that he doesn't even ask if I'm okay with having to work Wednesday
God what a fucking jackass [/bq]
This post has shown up on new pages a couple of times. (I think marc broke something)

Sorry man.

Naaaaaah I'm fine. The men in my family have a weird way of bonding. If we ever truly do get mad at each other we don't just let it sit and fester. There's no snide comments, no passive aggressive phone calls or texts. We just vent our frustrations and then we punch each other and we're golden.
